title: PGPD Investigating Fatal Pedestrian Collision in Lanham
body:
The
Collision Analysis and Reconstruction Unit is investigating a fatal pedestrian
collision in Lanham. The victim is 39-year-old Julie Risal of Pigeonwing Place
in Columbia, Maryland. On June 8, 2018, at approximately 3:30 am,
patrol officers responded to Martin Luther King Jr. Highway and Forbes
Boulevard for a collision involving a pedestrian and a car. When they arrived,
the officers found Risal in the roadway. She was taken to the hospital where
she died several hours later.The investigation reveals the victim was
struck while crossing Martin Luther King Jr. Highway. The driver remained on
the scene. Preliminarily, investigators do not believe the victim was in a
crosswalk.   Anyone with information is
asked to call the Prince George’s County Police Department’s Collision Analysis
and Reconstruction Unit at 301-731-4422.  Callers wishing to
remain anonymous may call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411-TIPS (8477), or go online at www.pgcrimesolvers.com, or use the “P3 Tips” mobile app (search “P3 Tips” in
the Apple Store or Google Play to download the app onto your mobile device.)
